```{r}
require(tidyverse)
require(ggplot2)
require(readxl)
```

```{r}
dnp <- read_excel("../../2_input/1_raw_data/DNP.xlsx") %>% 
  mutate(country = as.factor(ifelse(grepl('N', code), 'Storfjord', 'Malla')))

dnp %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = country, y = NH4)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~ Habitat)
```

```{r}
dung_data_transect_summary <- readr::read_csv('../../2_input/2_data_products/dung_data_transect_summary.csv')
```
```{r}
fit <- lmer(PO4 ~ country * Habitat + (1 | ID), data = dnp) 
summary(fit)

lsmeans(fit, pairwise ~ country*Habitat, lmer.df = "Satterthwaite", adjust = "tukey")$contrasts
```
